basic.description: An examination of specific topics in contemporary design practice with special attention to the areas of lighting, costume, and sound design: includes theoretical and practical design projects.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Elements of Design Practice

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     Level 3 and (reg in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-Plan, or STSC Spec. Plan) and (a grade of B- in each of DRAM200, DRAM220, DRAM240, DRAM241) and (a GPA of 2.6 in DRAM) or permission of the Department.
